name: SynWrite Project
summary: Learn about .SYNW-PROJ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: You can view your project through the "Project Manager" view in SynWrite. The Project Manager is accessible by opening the left panel and click the "Project" tab between the "Tree" and "Tabs" tabs.

description: A SYNW-PROJ file is a project file used by SynWrite, a free text and source code editor. It contains a list of files and folders grouped into a project structure/tree. The project does not contain the actual files in the project structure.
